home.additional_description: Our system provides a structured environment for collaboration, offering deep object customization, including advanced capabilities for managing user rights and change versions.

call_to_action.text: Join ObjectBoard today and experience a new level of organized, visual, and controlled teamwork. Sign up for free or explore existing public boards.
call_to_action.title: Ready to Transform Your Collaboration?

home.general_description: Your visual, interactive, and regulated platform for collaboration. Create, customize, and manage access to objects with unparalleled flexibility.

how_it_works.step_1_text: Start by creating a new board for your project, team, or idea. Give it a name and a description to set the context.
how_it_works.step_2_text: Populate your board with various objects like shapes, text, and lines. Customize their properties, group them, and set up complex structures.
how_it_works.step_3_text: Invite members to your board and assign roles. Control who can view, edit, or create specific content, ensuring smooth and secure teamwork.
how_it_works.step_4_text: Track all modifications with our version control system. Administrators can review contributions and approve them to become part of the official board version.
how_it_works.title: How ObjectBoard Works

key_features.1_text: An intuitive and dynamic interface that makes collaboration natural and effective.
key_features.2_text: Extensive object configuration options, including grouping, and detailed attributes.
key_features.3_text: Precise control over who can view, edit, or create objects on the board.
key_features.4_text: Flexible role distribution and detailed access rights management for each user, ensuring order and security.
key_features.5_text: Group objects, set individual permissions for viewing, editing, and creating new objects.
key_features.6_text: Changes made by each individual user are saved as a separate version.. Administrators can review and approve changes, forming a new common version of the board.
key_features.title: Key Advantages of ObjectBoard

not_found.message: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
not_found.title: Oops! Page Not Found.
